name: Obsidian Starter Kit
summary: A comprehensive Obsidian vault template with systems, templates, and best practices.
explanation: The Obsidian Starter Kit (OSK) is a comprehensive Obsidian vault template created by SÃ©bastien Dubois that includes pre-configured systems, templates, folder structure, and documentation for building an effective PKM system. It incorporates best practices from Zettelkasten, PARA, Johnny Decimal, and other methodologies. Systems include: Journaling, Zettelkasten, Learning, Content Curation, Maps, People, Meeting Notes, Health, and more. Available at obsidianstarterkit.com.
